downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2 White Paper: Country-Specific Updates for India
downloadDescription: This white paper describes the country-specific updates that are released for India in Cumulative Update 1 (CU–1) for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2. See Microsoft Knowledge Base article 2807685 for hotfix download information.
detailsSection: For more information about other information that is specific to India, see the Microsoft Dynamics AX Help on TechNet. Information that is specific to India includes (IND) in the title.
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
